How it works

Focus On The Work You Love

Create a Single Source of Truth

Store all your inforamtion in one place. Save time updating and showing your organisation compliance information by keeping it all unified.

Save Heaps of Time

Accreditron was built to save providers time. Our easy step-by-step system makes submitting information a quick, painless experience. Save over $720 of overhead time right away. Accreditrons's easy step-by-step guide will save you on average 36 hours of time submiting pre-assessment information to your Assessor. We only ask you the same question once, so your next submission will save you even more.

Secure & Transparent

Know your information is safe in transit and have visiblity over who your sharing your organisation's information with.

Save time completing your Accreditation

Funding due-dilligence is easier and more transparent.

Submit your information online

Rather than a paper form and multiple emails, Accreditron lets you submit online.

Redesigned Experience

We've re-thought the Accreditation Pre-Assessment process to make it clearer, faster, and easier to complete.

All your organisation's information in one dashboard

Safely manage and maintain your organisations compliance documentation.

Never answer the same question twice.

Any information you submit through Accreditron is stored in your private dashboard. If you get asked for it in the future, we'll have to ready to go - and if you need to share this info with your team, its all in one place.

Never lose information

Some documents need to be stored for 7 years. Ensure your information is safe and secure in the cloud, and can't be lost in a fire or have coffee spilled on it.

Manage your staff files.

Be confident that your organisation's staff files are up to date and correct.

Coming Soon - Contact Us

Hands off compliance

Are your police vets up to date? Do you have all of the correct information stored? Are your processes compliant?

Our tool automatically checks your staff file's compliance - and if there's an issue, you're notified right away.

Volunteer Support

We'd love to hear from you!

Please get in touch and we will get back to you soon.

hello@accreditron.com


Don't hesitate to ask us something. Send a message or email us directly at hello@accreditron.com.

We have designed Accreditron by working closely with Social Service Providers, and your feedback is the best way to help us serve the social sector.
